embed.title: Informations
embed.description: Select one of the information below that you would like to see about me!

third.label: Host and Status
third.description: Informations about memory usage, CPU, etc...

nayembed.title: Hello, i am Nay!
nayembed.description: I'm a Discord bot, created by `{{ownerTag}}` in **{{createdAt}}** with the intention of entertaining and divert the members of the servers where i am!

fields.name: Acknowledgments
fields.value:
- To `{{coOwner}}` for always helping me to be more complete
- To all my contributors on my [Github]({{github}})
- To all the staff at [my server]( {{serverInvite}})
- And to you for using my commands :heart:

embed1.title: Make Embed
embed1.description: Select below the way you want to embed:

title.description: Send the title of the embed

description.description: Send the description of the embed

thumbnail.description: Send the thumbnail of the embed in an image, by file or URL

image.description: Send the image of the embed in an image, by file or URL

footer.description:
Send the embed footer, separating the icon from the text using **|**
Example: `text | https://my.icon.png`

author.description:
Send the embed author, separating the icon from the text using **|**
Example: `text | https://my.icon.png`

fields.description:
Send the embed fields, separating the name from the value using **|**, and separating each field by **;**
Example: `name | value ; name2 | value2`

timestamp.description: Want to use timestamp in your embed?
